alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wakulla and northern Franklin Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 302 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crawfordville, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, Sopchoppy, Shadeville, Hyde Park, Wakulla Springs, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Arran, Mcintyre, Tully, Panacea, Shell Point, Medart, Buckhorn, Spring Creek, Bethel and Curtis Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla
